3det_arquetipo_info_p1: Archetypes are a starting point to create your character. They help when you donâ€™t yet know exactly who they are or where they came from.
3det_arquetipo_info_p2: An archetype represents the kind of being your character is: it can be a people different from humans, a specific ethnicity within a species, an artificial, fantastic, alien or supernatural being.
3det_arquetipo_info_p3: You donâ€™t need to choose an archetype â€” but using one helps a lot, since it gives a ready base with story pieces, culture and even parts of the character build.
3det_atributos_info_p1: Attributes are the fundamental traits of the character â€” the basis of everything they can do. They go from 0 to 5, and the higher the value, the better the performance.
3det_atributos_info_p2: During character creation, no attribute can exceed 5, even if you have points left. After gaining experience, itâ€™s possible to increase this limit.
3det_atributos_info_p3: Some advantages can temporarily raise an attribute above 5, but only while the effect lasts â€” afterwards, the value returns to normal.
3det_dica_pericias: If a skill is selected and you need to roll that attribute, you can roll with one extra die!
3det_vantagens_info_p1: Beyond attributes and skills, you can spend points to buy advantages â€” powers, special techniques or unique abilities of your hero.
3det_vantagens_info_p2: Each advantage gives a specific mechanical effect in the game, but the source of the power is completely free:
3det_vantagens_info_p3: â€¢ Your Reach can come from bow and arrow, eye lasers, elastic arms, sound waves etc.
3det_vantagens_info_p4: â€¢ Being Charismatic can come from being cute, inspiring, famous or manipulative.
3det_vantagens_info_p5: The mechanics are fixed, but the explanation is 100% narrative, defined by you.
3det_desvantagens_info_p1: Disadvantages are problems, limitations or obstacles the character carries. They make life harder but also make your hero more human, interesting and memorable â€” like in movies, games and comics.
3det_desvantagens_info_p2: They donâ€™t make you worse; they just make your character different and deeper.
3det_desvantagens_info_p3: Also, by choosing disadvantages you earn extra points to spend on attributes, advantages and other important things. This balance helps build a strong, well-crafted character.
3det_dica_truques: ğŸ’¡ What are Tricks and Techniques?
3det_truques_info_p1: A legendary strike, a secret jutsu, a forbidden spellâ€¦ or even a chefâ€™s special dish â€” all represent unique, rare and powerful techniques your character may learn.
3det_truques_info_p2: These techniques can come from various sources:
3det_truques_info_p3: â€¢ Taught by a master hidden in a distant monastery;
3det_truques_info_p4: â€¢ Passed down through generations by infiltrated ninjas;
3det_truques_info_p5: â€¢ Created by an archmage and kept in a lost grimoire;
3det_truques_info_p6: â€¢ Or even developed by a famous chef on a culinary reality show.
3det_truques_info_p7: Regardless of the form, each legendary technique has a story, a style and a powerful impact, making the character more striking and unique in the world.
3det_skilldesc_0: You can handle animals and monsters. You can train, care for and ride them.
3det_skilldesc_1: You can perform artistic acts: sing, dance, play, cook, draw.
3det_skilldesc_2: You know sports and their rules. You can run, swim, climb, jump and do acrobatics.
3det_skilldesc_3: You can persuade or influence others. Includes diplomacy, leadership, intimidation.
3det_skilldesc_4: You can attack and defend in combat, melee or at range.
3det_skilldesc_5: You can perform tricks and stealthy or illegal actions: steal, sabotage, pick locks.
3det_skilldesc_6: You can operate, repair and create machines and vehicles. Also works with computers.
3det_skilldesc_7: You can care for health: first aid, diagnoses, treat diseases and poisons.
3det_skilldesc_8: You understand magic and supernatural forces. Use to attack, defend and study creatures.
3det_skilldesc_9: You can observe and hear better what happens around. Helps notice details.
3det_skilldesc_10: You know many things: sciences, languages, supernatural subjects and how to research.
3det_skilldesc_11: You can live in harsh conditions: find food, build shelter, track.
3det_offadvdesc_0: The more hits you land, the stronger they get. Spend 2 MP per hit to increase power.
3det_offadvdesc_1: Your attacks and abilities reach farther. You can hit distant enemies without penalty.
3det_offadvdesc_2: You can spend MP to improve attacks with different effects (Area, Shock, Distant).
3det_offadvdesc_3: When attacking enemies, you recover energy: Life (1 HP per 3 damage) or Mana (1 MP per 3).
3det_offadvdesc_4: After attacking, the target takes extra damage next round. Costs 2 MP per attack.
3det_offadvdesc_5: +2 on physical tests. You can spend 2 MP to guarantee a critical.
3det_offadvdesc_6: A powerful attack for nearly defeated enemies. Costs 3 MP.
3det_offadvdesc_7: You are trained against a specific creature type. In tests against them, you can get a critical.
3det_offadvdesc_8: Your powers are harder to resist. Spend 2 MP or more to increase difficulty.
3det_offadvdesc_9: You can stop the target from acting. Spend 2 MP and beat the targetâ€™s defense to immobilize it.
3det_defadvdesc_0: Temporarily cancels an enemyâ€™s advantage. They make a Resistance test to resist.
3det_defadvdesc_1: You have a safe refuge. There, all tests have Gain and you recover resources.
3det_defadvdesc_2: Creates copies of you (2 MP each). They vanish when you are hit.
3det_defadvdesc_3: An attack that leaves the target confused (chooses targets randomly). Costs 2 MP.
3det_defadvdesc_4: Heal 1D HP for 2 MP or let you retry Resistance tests against effects.
3det_defadvdesc_5: Recover HP every turn: 1 HP or 3 HP depending on level.
3det_defadvdesc_6: Spend 3 MP to become invisible. Gain when hiding; enemies have Loss.
3det_defadvdesc_7: Each point gives +10 HP. You can buy multiple times to increase more.
3det_defadvdesc_8: You are more resilient. +2 on health tests. You can spend 2 MP to guarantee a critical.
3det_disadvdesc_0: Works well only in a certain environment. Outside of it, you may suffer Loss.
3det_disadvdesc_1: Doesnâ€™t remember who they are. The GM controls the sheet in secret.
3det_disadvdesc_2: Loss on social tests. No criticals.
3det_disadvdesc_3: Loss on coordination/agility tests. No criticals.
3det_disadvdesc_4: Physically weak. Loss on effort tests. No criticals.
3det_disadvdesc_5: Low resilience. Loss in health/diseases. No criticals.
3det_disadvdesc_6: Vulnerable to something specific (uncommon or common).
3det_disadvdesc_7: Loss in initiative and spends more movement.
3det_disadvdesc_8: Grotesque appearance. Loss in initiative and social tests.
3det_trickdesc_0: Magical defense (1 MP). You can use Mysticism instead of Fight.
3det_trickdesc_1: Control an element (fire, water, air, earth, light, darkness).
3det_trickdesc_2: Choose 2 special moves such as Trip, Feint, Stunning.
3det_trickdesc_3: Magical attack (1 MP = attack with Mysticism or Fight).
3det_trickdesc_4: Walk on walls/ceiling, jump very far, run over water.
